system.description:
You can directly channel power from the upper planes, whether the gods will it or not. At the end of each long rest, you gain a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} feature. This feature must be from a cleric archetype and granted to clerics of 2nd level. 

Alternatively, you can instead gain @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zhuf06durl8bnmh3]{Turn Undead} with the benefit of two instances of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.wwk94syro18y9892]{Destroy Undead} empowerment. This latter options gains a third instance of such an empowerment at 14th level, and a 4th at 17th level.

Once you have used the chosen cleric feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
